animeDescription: Yuu is a girl who has lost her memories. She is mailed into a sadistic house of bondage where she and others are forced (or not) to serve their master, Renji, but there are serious consequences for those who fail.
animeRelated: ['Side story: Bondage Game: Shinsou no Reijoutachi - Shinsou no Doreitachi']
